mapper.insert: INSERT INTO games (game_name, game_score, game_developer, release_date, game_description, game_categories, game_platforms, game_image_url) VALUES (#{gameName}, #{gameScore}, #{gameDeveloper}, #{releaseDate}, #{gameDescription}, #{gameCategories}, #{gamePlatforms}, #{gameImageUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM games WHERE game_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR game_developer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR game_description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR game_categories LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR game_platforms LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') Limit #{start} , #{size}
SELECT * FROM games ORDER BY game_score DESC LIMIT #{start} , #{size}
